instructions.1: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
instructions.2: Beat butter and confectioners' sugar in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Add vanilla extract, almond extract, and salt; mix briefly to incorporate.
instructions.3: Gradually stir 3/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons flour into the creamed butter, add almonds, and mix until dough is just combined.
instructions.4: Shape dough into tiny crescents; place on an ungreased baking sheet about 2 inches apart.
instructions.5: Bake cookies in preheated oven until edges are golden, about 15 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
instructions.6: Roll cookies in sifted confectioners' sugar when cooled.
